title: Calling all leqgue sensei's
body: Would anyone around gold+ possibly wanna teach a bronze like me how to improve and maybe play some games in their division so that I can really improve before season 7 starts. Thanks!

replies.body:
Look into these youtubers 
https://www.youtube.com/user/bingegamingdottv/videos
https://www.youtube.com/user/lastshadow9 
Watch their coaching videos and listen to what they say, they are quite good. 

And also follow this tier list for now until Ls Coach makes another one for season 7 
http://i.imgur.com/zqmtyiq.jpg
pick 2 champions from this tier list for your rank and stick to them, for jungle i'd really suggest Zac and maokai (the tier list is slightly out dated and master yi and warwick are not very good anymore) And for mid lane annie and lissandre (annie as your main) This is to learn basics of the lane, and only play these in ranked. 
only play the 2 per lane you chose in ranked for the roles you play. 

But looking at your match history you seem to be a jungle/mid laner.  So i'd suggest Zac/maokai (they are good for early ganks and also they have strong teamfight/carry protection) and for mid play annie, she is easy to learn and you want to focus on nothing but csing for a while, until you can get like 70 + at 10 mins. (as you're bronze you can hard carry games just by cs lead) Always remember as a mid laner 13 cs is = to 1 kill, so unless a kill gets you a dragon/tower/baron etc it's probably more worth it to farm, unless the kill is free
That second guy you suggested to watch is freaking creepy

He's the best one of the two. He's got great game knowledge and experience of living in the Samsung Blue house during 2014. Also he doesn't beat around the bush. The other guy is some Tryndamere one trick who likes to showoff. Having said that, you could probably still learn things from him also.
